text: if you're trying to level up quickly if
you're just starting out the best piece
of advice that I can have is try to get
a few lucky eggs you get some naturally
as you level up or if you want to do a
few of the in-app purchases you can get
a few more they're not too expensive and
save them up to do some evolving so what
you want to do is catch the piggies
caterpie's and wheedle x' which take 12
candies in the game you get three
candies every time you catch one stack
up all all those candies and then pop a
lucky egg and just go on a little
evolving bin for a half hour
normally it gives you 500 experience but
if you use the lucky egg to double your
XP it gives you a thousand and then
there's also the the egg incubators in
the game they cost about 33 cents per
egg hatch the other good use for trying
to level up quickly would be to if
you're in a big city where there's
hotspots like Grand Army Plaza or if
there's often a sort of a lure party
going on where people will put up lures
on pokey stops constantly so you don't
really need to spend money on incense or
lures in order to be at a constant
stream of Pokemon
